definition: enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
variant of 勾[gou1]
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to be capable of/to be able to/can
not enough/insufficient/inadequate
enough/sufficient
unbearable/terrible/enough/unlikely
to have had enough of/to be fed up with/to have had one's fill of
to be unable to reach
able to pass muster/qualified/apt/presentable
lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
wonderful/great/delightful/very kind/generous
to break even/to get one's money's worth
to reach/to be up to
(coll.) to be a true friend
to be quite an ordeal/to be hard to bear
variant of 夠嗆|够呛[gou4 qiang4]
avid/eager for/longing for/to look forward to

sentences.english: Because I diden't have enough, but now I do. the little boy replied.
sentences.chinese: 因为我之前不够，但我现在已经够了，小孩回答。

sentences.english: You have made your way around this hill country long enough; now turn north.
sentences.chinese: 你们绕行这山的日子够了，要转向北去。

sentences.english: A single high brightness LED is enough.
sentences.chinese: 只要一个高亮度的LED灯就够了。

sentences.english: It is enough for a tree to yield one sort of fruit, and for a man to fulfil his own peculiar calling.
sentences.chinese: 人要实现他的特殊使命已有够多的工作要做了。

sentences.english: Enough is enough they say - it's time to fight back.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为恶作剧的时间已经够了，现在是时候回击了。

sentences.english: There was already more than enough femininity in his life.
sentences.chinese: 他的生命已经具备了够充足的女性成份。

sentences.english: When it comes to relationships……how do you know when enough is enough?
sentences.chinese: 聊到爱情，如何能知讲是实的够了？

sentences.english: Also, the rooms are big enough for our kids.
sentences.chinese: 而且，对我的孩子来说，房子也够大。

sentences.english: In my opinion, you are muddleheaded enough.
But Mr. Lea's being good enough to let them keep dragging on around here.
sentences.chinese: 但是李老爷让他们在这里苟延残喘已经够好心了。

sentences.english: I have enough in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我生活鲤的麻烦已经够多滤。

sentences.english: Refreshingly enough, the myth-busting didn't always come from scientists.
sentences.chinese: 够爽吧，破解神秘并不总是靠科学家。

sentences.english: The real question is whether China's stimulus is big enough?
sentences.chinese: 真正的问题是中国的刺激计划是否够规模？

sentences.english: I inquired at the car rental desk. "Nope, just the one mate."
sentences.chinese: 我问租车店的伙计，“不，一个够了。”
